room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: Olivia is rude at this establishment, the rooms are less than mediocre.

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: What a fun night with the family. Our first Escape room and we ALMOST made it although we couldn't same the girl, we couldn't name the correct suspect, we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: We had a great time today catching Jack the Ripper and freeing his final victim! Natalie made every minute a pleasure! Thank you! Can't wait for Silo!

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: Tonight was our 2nd time coming to The Escapery with my mom, my brother, and myself and we've loved it both times! The Ripper mystery was fun and creepy and just made for a great night John was a great friendly host from walking through the door, and gave us the perfect amount of advice to let us barely beat the room!Very fun, very challenging, and very rewarding

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: An extremely fun experience. If you're looking for a night of fun with friends, I highly recommend The Escapery for a night of mystery solving adventure!The team there were extremely polite and helpful. The mystery (we did The Ripper) was challenging, but all the information was at our fingertips to solve the quandary.

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: Highly enjoyed spending a part of my 50th birthday at The Escapery. We escaped our Jack the Ripper room and can't praise the facility and staff enough! All 7 of us had an amazing time and feel sure that we will return again to try our hands at a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Ripper" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: So much fun! An excellent setup. It was like we were actually in the real investigation of Jack the Ripper. The puzzles really challenged us, they sure were tough! But our guide was extremely helpful and very cool. An excellent date night.
